content.question: In the fifth sentence of the first paragraph (“There is the League of Nations . . . reduction of armament”), the author comments on the age and effectiveness of the League of Nations primarily to explain

choices.label: why the First World War motivated world leaders to form alliances
why current measures may not indefinitely forestall another outbreak of war
its relevance to his argument regarding advances in peace preservation efforts
its significance as an exception to his generalization about human institutions

content.answer: its relevance to his argument regarding advances in peace preservation efforts

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe the line of reasoning and explain whether it supports an argument's overarching thesis.
